Text:
Hi all, .dpg is the format that the Nintendo ds, dslite, dsi, dsxl and 3ds plays when put on the R4i card for nds, its playable through the  Moonshell media player on the ds R4 card.
As far as i know you cant play it on normal pc media players as the resolution is only 244 x 192 for the small ds screen.
Thanks
